title: GURU
description: A chilling new age tale of war, power, spirituality and the occult. GURU weaves our deepest fears with ancient spiritual truths."Suspenseful and well written. Death waits at every turn and salvation seems impossible." L. Banford“Tobias Inigo has written a masterful story of spirituality and mankind’s darkest fears.” P.R. Brown“I felt like I was reading a new genre. GURU is a suspenseful Psychiller.” T.D McCall“You think this is about an average guy with an average life, until destiny grabs him by the neck and throws him into a ring of fire and terror.” Thomas Garmane
author: Tobias Inigo
